Provides Jupiter (Code Review) plug-in for Eclipse to facilitate code review using review editor and view. There are two main presentation parts, called editor and view.

Model Layer

Model controls a sigleton instance of iternal data container struture. Whenever the model is changed, it notifies the changes to the listener to hook on the model.

Presentation Layer

View presents the list of reviews.

Editor presents the input user interface to edit a review.
